Class AbstractMarketStatsReport

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.stats.AbstractAuctionReport
      uk.ac.liv.auction.stats.AbstractMarketStatsReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuctionEventListener, AuctionReport, Parameterizable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectRevelationReport, DynamicConvergenceReport, DynamicSurplusReport
public abstract class AbstractMarketStatsReport
extends AbstractAuctionReport

A report that performs additional calculations at the end of an auction before producing its results.
